website_summaries.verdict: This mineral antioxidant broad spectrum sunscreen was developed by a skin cancer doctor.
pros: Goes beyond sunscreen, also improving skin tone, firmness and radiance
Doesn’t leave a white cast and blends to a translucent, matte finish
Has a high level of zinc oxide for maximum sunblocking properties
It’s also suitable for kids over 6 months
cons: Some found it had a slippery texture and took some time to be absorbed

customer_reviews.title: Love this creme!
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of this mineral creme sunscreen on my face! It goes on a bit white, but it dries to a translucent, matte, velvety finish. I made the mistake of not letting it dry enough prior to applying eyeshadow on my first use, so the makeup didn't go on well at all. It also has the highest level of zinc oxide (17%) in a facial sunscreen compared to any other brands I've researched, so that's a definite win for someone like me who's terrified of the sun due to being riddled with melasma.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAngel

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT! The feeling is wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I am an original So-Cal beach bum with lots of skin cancer. I had a Mohs Surgery a few years ago on my face and it opened my eyes! I have tried several sunscreens and I recently found this MD Solar Sciences product through a backpacking article. I LOVE IT! The feeling is wonderful. It leaves my skin moisturized and completely protected. This has been the BEST Sunscreen I have used in years and have also used the tinted formula as well while backpacking - you can't go wrong with this product. And no.... I received nothing for free to do this article.
customer_reviews.author: rgiusti

customer_reviews.title: Worst sunscreen I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, I don't like to get tanned. I just don't. I wear sunscreen almost everyday for almost 10 years and I've used many different sunscreens. This one feels so bad on my face. It is super white. Can never be evenly applied to my face. It will stuck in my fine lines. Sometimes I have peeled off skin here or there due to dryness, and this sunscreen exaggerate them all. It won't make your face shinny though, just matte uneven white. I don't want to waste it, so I asked my boyfriend use it. He has fair skin tone. Even my boyfriend, a man who never cared about skin care products, hates it too!
customer_reviews.author: Ava Fox

customer_reviews.title: Bad skin reaction
customer_reviews.text: Consistency was great, easily blended and did not leave my face looking too white. However, I broke out ALL over my chin and around my jaw line up to my ears. Immediately after putting it on, my skin got dry then began to itch and then peel/break out. It is 5 days later and I am still dealing with areas on my chin. This is weird for me because I never get, nor have ever really gotten acne and I am 24 years old. Very upsetting, also doesn't help that it was 30 dollars and this was my result.
customer_reviews.author: Katie waite

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product but not for me
customer_reviews.text: I have the most sensitive skin on the planet. I was on Accutane and now use Retin-A RX. I have rosacea, acne and melasma. My skin is both very greasy and very dry/flaky. I tried this product because it's approved by the Skin Cancer Foundation and is Reef-Safe. Sadly, it was just too drying for me. I wore it for several days hoping my skin would adjust, but it didn't. By the end of the day, my face was red, tight and very flaky. My fiancé said it almost looked like a chemical burn. I think this is an amazing product, but it didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: LW21

customer_reviews.title: Sorry, But No. Pore Cloggers Galore!
customer_reviews.text: The first one I ordered wasn’t delivered to my door and ended up getting stolen. This sunscreen goes on clear and it’s made of physical barriers, BUT it has a very strong sunscreen smell and clogs your pores like crazy. My forehead and chin broke out like crazy while I was using this. If you don’t have sensitive/ oily skin, this might be a good option because it does provide a matte effect, but I think for the price point, there are better face sunscreens out there that aren’t chock full of silicones and pore clogging ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Let's Keep It Real

customer_reviews.title: The best sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I am very pale and my skin is super sensitive to the sun as well as skincare products so I've tried hundreds of sunscreens. This sunscreen is amazing and is the only one I use now. It has this super luxurious texture and smooths onto the skin like a makeup primer. In the summer I mix a few drops of foundation pigment into it and that's all I wear. It absorbs well, is never sticky, and I've never been burnt while wearing it, even though I've been sweating. It is also consistently very highly rated on the Environmental Work Group's Annual Sunscreen Guide.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Great face sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I love the texture of this sunblock. It applies easily and it gives my skin a lovely, matte finish rather than the shiny look that many other facial sunblocks I've tried have. I'm fairly pale, so I don't notice any whitish residue while applying. I only use it for my face, and the 1.7 oz size lasted about 10 months for me. Will definitely purchase again, even with the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.  A very unpleasant feel on the skin
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen must have a super high concentration of silicone(s) as it feels thick and heavy on my skin. I have very oily skin. I know silicone based products are supposed to be better for/preferred by people with oily skin; however, I hated how heavy, thick and greasy this felt on my skin. It never sinks in; just sits on my skin and feels thick and heavy. I don't use a ton of this either and it still feels like this, which is even worse because you're supposed to use a lot of sunscreen. I can't imagine using anything more than a tiny amount, and at that point you're not getting the SPF listed on the bottle. Not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good under makeup
customer_reviews.text: I got this solely for the purpose of wearing under my makeup because of all the rave reviews. Sadly it didn’t go so well and made my makeup very cakey and dry looking. And I’m an oily gal! I even waited an hour before putting makeup on AND blotted any excess off my face. Still a cakey mess. The only reason I’m giving it 3 stars is because it did keep me from getting sunburned at the beach for our trip and it didn’t break me out (another issue I have with sunscreens).
customer_reviews.author: Amberlee

customer_reviews.title: Guy with Beard: Not good enough
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product. I had seen a video where they said it left minimal white cast. Eventually I figured out how to apply it so that it wouldn’t leave much of a white cast. However you need very good lighting and when you travel that’s not always the case. I’m also a guy with a beard and I found that this sunscreen would leave white clumps in my hairs. So it would make me look like old man time. I don’t think I’ll continue to use this and my hunt for a daily mineral sunscreen continues.
customer_reviews.author: Romeo

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I have very sensitive skin and this sun screen doesn’t irritate it at all. It has a nice smooth matte finish that I feel like substitutes as my makeup primer. It’s a little pricier, but absolutely worth it. I wear it everyday (melasma forces me to) and a little goes a very long way. All I have to say is: don’t forget your ears!!
customer_reviews.author: B. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Light, matte, and it works
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mineral sunscreen after trying quite a few. I have acne prone skin and not only does this not aggregate blemishes, it seems to help clear them up. It's super light and dries matte. The overall health of my skin has improved since I started using it 6 months ago. As for its effectiveness, I wore it in the summer on the beach in Florida and it worked as well as the chemical sunscreen I used on my body.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: EWG approved sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: We switched to this sunscreen a few years ago when following EWG for most effective sunscreen that does not contain harmful chemicals and hormones. Modern science on sunscreen is that titanium dioxide and zinc are the most effective for sun exposure linked to cancer and aging skin. This works really well and is easy to rub in - not white on skin once rubbed in.
customer_reviews.author: Sudes

customer_reviews.title: Smooth not heavy
customer_reviews.text: This goes on smooth for a mineral face sunscreen. It’s a tiny bit chalky which is because of the zinc (which I prefer over chemical sunscreens.) Despite the slight chalkiness, it rubs in well (no white residue). It did not feel heavy over my regular moisturizer. This is much better than any of the face sticks I’ve tried that either go on too pasty and tacky or too white. I put this on 30 mins before getting into the pool and had no problem with it running in my eyes or anything. Plus this got a highest rating by the Environmental Working Group. This will make me want to wear face sunscreen every day.
customer_reviews.author: Celebritee

customer_reviews.title: Feels so good on skin!
customer_reviews.text: I have normal/dry skin, fair, and sensitive to a lot of sunscreen ingredients. Love this sunblock! It feels like velvet going on my face. It's not great if your sweating but I haven't found anything that is except the chemical ones anyway. I just love the feeling of applying this one because it feels so soft and smooth. Only a slight white tint that seems to sink in after a few minutes. I have freckles so I can always tell when sunblock looks pasty and this one doesn't look like that all once you give it a few minutes to soak in.
customer_reviews.author: ace

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work for me. I ordered it based on positive reviews, but I have used it for two weeks now to give it a fair chance and I wish I hadn’t. I have combination skin and this product caused major breakouts for me. I have redness and a lot of dry patches now. I have so many red bumps and am so disappointed to have spent more money on a sunscreen than I have before and to have gotten such terrible results.
customer_reviews.author: Marcela Luna

customer_reviews.title: Best face sunscreen ever! Goes on smooth with NO burning to sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best by far, not only a facial sunscreen but also moisturizer for under make-up. I have tan skin and did not find it ghostly as one reviewer put it. I use retin-a which makes my skin extremely sensitive. I have had problems finding a sunscreen or even moisturizer for that matter that does not feel like it is burning my face off, even ones made for sensitive skin. This has no sting what so ever, which is just amazing to me. I cannot recommend this enough - I just love the way it feels on my skin. I will never use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Sevie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey but so worth the additional cost considering it's the first product for sun protection that I'm able to use on my face without causing any skin irritation. I've tried numerous facial sun block products, baby, sensitive, etc., all of which burn and sting with immediate application and worsens with sweating/sun exposure. NOT this one!! Plus super silky smooth application and sits well under makeup if I choose to wear any over it. I haven't had issue with it whitening my complexion with or without makeup like others commented. Overall love love love this product and highly recommend to any and all people sensitive to any chemical sunscreen or facial moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanna Sicolo

customer_reviews.title: amazing sunscreen!!
customer_reviews.text: this is the best sunscreen i’ve ever used. it doesn’t make your face shiny like all the other sunscreens do, IT IS MATTE. it gives a blurring effect and makes my skin feel moisturized. it rubs in really well, and there is little to no white cast. i would recommend this to anybody. it does have a little of a weird scent when putting it on, but you can’t smell it after the sunscreen has been applied. the only problem is that it’s a little pricey for not that much product.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Galvin

customer_reviews.title: Stays slippery all day -- never dries
customer_reviews.text: I am ambivalent as to how many stars to give this product -- three of four. I like the high percentage of mineral sunscreen agents in this product, but I need something with a matte finish to wear under makeup and also on my body. I would like to NOT feel slippery all day, which is how this product makes me feel... slippery. It never really dries to a matte finish.
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: Best facial sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: A small tube of this came with the kit for a chemical peel I had at my dermatologist. It is non-drying and blends in completely. While I have not used it under makeup, I feel it would do very well under any foundation. I have so much sun damage on my face I wish I was smarter a long time ago. I use the anytime I will be outside directly in the sun for more than 30 minutes. Less than 30 minutes I'm probably taking out the garbage, a few other yard tasks like being bent down pulling weeds! :)
customer_reviews.author: T. Simons

customer_reviews.title: Purchased November 2019 for $30 from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is wonderful, but I won’t reorder it now that the price for the 4 oz was $30 back in November and now it is $42 for the 4 oz. Quite the price increase..........
customer_reviews.author: RenHi

customer_reviews.title: shiny, small, expensive, inaccurate SPF rating?
customer_reviews.text: It made me break out like crazy! it feels smooth ( silicon like) and leaves a slight white tint behind. It never dries fully, so your skin looks shiny all day. The tube is tiny and you have to shake it really well every time to mix the sunblock. Too expensive as well. I also wonder why there is a difference in SPF between Mineral Crème SPF 50 and Mineral Tinted Crème SPF 30? Both have the same ingredients yet different SPF. It appears that the company is not being honest about their products.
customer_reviews.author: Europe

customer_reviews.title: worth the price to snorkel in Hawaii
customer_reviews.text: The Hawaiian islands want folks to use bio-degradable sunscreen to help protect their reefs and fish. This product went on easily, absorbed quickly, and gave outstanding protection. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ruthalice

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy
customer_reviews.text: Overall happy with this sunscreen! Does has a slight white tent but it goes away after a while. I wouldn’t recommend this for anyone with darker skin. It also feels very moisturizing to the point I can about skip my moisturizer when I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Better for pool or beach day, not good for every day
customer_reviews.text: I think this one would be better as a pool or beach day sunscreen, not an every day one. It leaves a white cast and it's actually very hard to get off at the end of the day since it's so waterproof. It did not give me any acne or make my face oily, but it would come off under my nails when I itched my face.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: This is the best I have ever found
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled for decades to find sun protection that doesn’t break out my face. I bought a tiny bottle from my dermatologist for a crazy price. When it was time to replace I got the big one from Amazon for the same price as the tiny one from the doctor. I love the feel of this sunscreen and it works great for sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: Julie K

customer_reviews.title: Slick silicone, heavy feeling does not dry
customer_reviews.text: This product is a silicone based one but too much silicone in the product, when applying on it glides on slippery, slick and heavy feeling but that feeling does not dissipate nor does it dry. Even when you wait 20 minutes for the product to dry it just does not dry. Perhaps it might be better suited for someone that does not use make up.
customer_reviews.author: MIA

customer_reviews.title: Dull skin
customer_reviews.text: This absorbs onto your skin very quickly.. After a month of using this, I noticed my skin was very dull and dry. One day I stopped using it and my skin feels back to normal again. This cream takes away the brightness from your face.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Best sunscreen ever!
customer_reviews.text: Just took two bottles with us to Turks &Caicos for scuba, jet skiing, snorkeling, soaking up the sun! Didn't even get burnt! First time ever!
customer_reviews.author: Elena Wiener

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Face Sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: This is thee perfect face sunscreen!! I have combination and acne prone skin. The finish is matte, so it does not feel like you are applying sunscreen or wearing sunscreen. Also, it's fragrance free which is amazing for acne prone and sensitive skin. Yes, it does have a small white cast because it's SUNSCREEN!! The only con is if you get to close to the eyes it could irritate them like most sunscreens do.

customer_reviews.title: 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 A GREAT PRODUCT!!! 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It works great, but a little pricey. I already see my freckles and sun damage fading. I only started using it two and a half weeks ago! It does sting if you rub your eyes, especially if you sweat a lot. Yes, I forgot I was wearing it since it is so light. I would suggest having clean wash cloths or an extra towel available if you sweat heavily or are going swimming.
customer_reviews.author: RavenSilvereyes

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a noticeable white cast!
customer_reviews.text: I have combo skin, I purchased this sunscreen because of the good reviews but it did not work for me! Definitely NOT something you can wear under makeup! it’s really drying to the face, even when not wearing makeup it leaves a noticeable white cast, and gunks up in the eyebrows, and hair line.... I don’t recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: norma mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sunblock for serious protection.
customer_reviews.text: I live in The Bahamas and it’s sunny everyday! I use this sunblock daily after trying many others. This has 5he most coverage with feeling less greasy than most. Worth the price! Also I recommend the regular version not the one with color. As the colored one is messy and gets all over your clothes. If you want serious sin coverage this is the one. Buy the larger size as it’s better value.
customer_reviews.author: MCC

customer_reviews.title: Great feel, minimal white cast.
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this sunscreen feels, it go s on very silky rather than making you feel oily or heavy. It also doesn’t leave a white cast like other mineral sunscreens. Well, it does a little it but not as obvious as other sunscreens. I have dark skin and this is the best one I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: AvidPurchaser

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!! You'll love it for your face!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this stuff 3 times, and bout to buy another bottle... I LOVE this stuff for my Face and my daughters face... I don't use it all over the body, because its WAY too expensive, and the tube is small. However, for the face it lasts a pretty long time, because a little goes a long way, and it feels silky smooth going on. Much like a skin perfecter lotion for your face. I'm trying to find something comparable, thats maybe cheaper... but as for right now... this is what I'll stick with.. it truly is great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Best face sunscreen I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.text: Best face sunscreen I’ve tried and I’ve tried them all. I had a chemical peel and this is what they gave me in a travel size. I loved it so much I bought this one. Totally have to try it. Only need a little bit. And don’t have to use for everyday. I use it when I’m going to be out in the sun all day. Boating beach etc.
customer_reviews.author: Naustin

customer_reviews.title: I use sunscreen daily, and this one is great.
customer_reviews.text: I like this because it barely has a scent at all. It is a bit more oily than lotion feeling. I love the ingredients, simple but it works. I've found that this stuff stays on very well through sweat, not sure for water. I use sunscreen daily, and this works great.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way. This sunscreen is great for oily skin, provides a matte finish, very smooth application and no smell. Does not cause breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: No allergic reaction! Yay!
customer_reviews.text: I’m always looking for a sunscreen that doesn’t make me look like a ghost. This one is pretty sheer if you run it in, and it seems effective. Also, I get allergic reactions to some sunscreens (break out in hives), but this one is great—no allergic reactions. If you have a ton of allergies like me, this sunscreen is a godsend.
customer_reviews.author: tomatogirl

customer_reviews.title: I would have gave it more stars
customer_reviews.text: I would have gave it five stars and repurchase, if it doesn’t irritate my eyes when I apply it under my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will order this again
customer_reviews.text: Works and easy to wear. I don't need a primer when I use this I put it on, with makeup over it. I am a golfer, no burning in the eyes, and protected my face.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Bombassei

customer_reviews.title: Daily sunscreen favorite
customer_reviews.text: Smooth, not sticky, formula is pleasant to wear and does not irritate my eyes, which means I actually do wear this on my face and neck every day without fail. Expensive, but it lasts. Much less expensive and much more pleasant than chemotherapeutic creams for skin cancer.
customer_reviews.author: Kathrine Varnes

customer_reviews.title: Very little product
customer_reviews.text: This is a zero residue smooth and sensitive skin ( at least my type of sensitive) friendly. It actually makes my skin look smoother! Who can argue with that? Just a word about the amount of product in this tube is very disappointing ! Only 4 applications. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: Fair

customer_reviews.title: Drying and uneven white cast
customer_reviews.text: I’m so dissapojnted. I’m very fair and this sunscreen gave me an uneven white cast. It also dried out my skin and peels/pills off. My forehead was covered in flakes. It seems to work and I like that it has a high zinc oxide but it looks so bad I won’t use it on my face anymore.
customer_reviews.author: uDesign

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I'm allergic to just about everything I've tried. No issues with this AND my face got zero sun even though I only applied it once and spent the entire day at the lake. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Karen M.

customer_reviews.title: tube is half-empty
customer_reviews.text: this product came highly recommended. it came in a box and was sealed . The tube appeared normal. As soon as I removed the seal, a lot of air came out before any cream appeared. The tube immediately deflated and now appears half full at most. Beware of repackaged product ! I will buy directly from Sephora next time.
customer_reviews.author: Curly Sue

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Since I live in Florida, I use it everyday on my neck and chest. (It can be worn under makeup too.) It is very lightweight, not greasy, and it's odorless. I love that it doesn't stain clothes either.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. Put on your regular moisturizer and then apply this on top. It will leave a little bit of a shine and greasy feel after application so I suggest using translucent powder to take away the shine and to keep your mascara from smudging under your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if the one I got was defective or what, but it was a pain in the butt to squeeze some product out of that tiny hole at the top of the tube. No mattsr how hard I shook the tube, or squeezed it, only clear liquid would come out and occasionally some while clumps of sunscreen, not worth my time so I threw it away
customer_reviews.author: Kauionalani

customer_reviews.title: Great sunscreen for daily use
customer_reviews.text: I love this sunscreen for my face. I have sensitive skin that is prone to breakouts with most sunscreens, but this brand is gentle and effective. I wear it daily under my makeup. It absorbs quickly as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Irritated my skin
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen looks great on the skin. Perfect for oily skin because it’s matte although feels a little heavy from the silicone but nothing unbearable. It has a little of a white cast but not too noticeable. I liked it during the day but at night when I washed my face it was so sensitive and after applying my products it burned so bad I struggled to fall asleep. My face was red and irritated so had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Best mineral sunblock with a primer finish.
customer_reviews.text: Best mineral sunblock with a primer finish. It has one of the highest zinc %, but doesn’t leave you white. It actually leaves you with a primed perfect canvas for your makeup. Very luxurious.
customer_reviews.author: YC

customer_reviews.title: Cosmetically elegant, itchy eyes.
customer_reviews.text: The consistency is great (full of silicones, feels smooth) the color is ok (medium/light) and easy to apply. Not greasy, not overly drying. It would have been my go to sunscreen if not for the issue that other reviewers noted that it bothered their eyes. Mine would itch after a couple of hours using (and I would not place it on my eyelids).
customer_reviews.author: Jmh

customer_reviews.title: It is a pretty good product
customer_reviews.text: It is a pretty good product. 50spf is what I was looking for, but I didn't love the texture. I would probably get it again, but I'd want to try some other products also. My friend swears by it and says its the best, but I wasn't 100% sold on it. If you haven't found your perfect cream, this is definitely worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Leaves you looking white-ish
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the product glides on smoothly yet is not greasy or oily. I don’t like that it leaves a faint white film on my face and body causing me to appear slightly more pale. For the price, it’s a very small amount. I’ll use the rest but don’t plan to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: I used this sunscreen when I play softball and travel ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this sunscreen when I play softball and travel. Re-apply every hour and I don't get tan. Only downside is that it's very hard to remove. My face feels silicony unless I clean it with eye makeup remover. Not my daily option as it is really tough to remove and it's quite drying.
customer_reviews.author: C.zs

customer_reviews.title: Best sunscreen for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I have a very oily skin and this is the first sunscreen that has worked for me without making my skin oily. I highly recommend this. And it's SPF 50 which is awesome. This along with FAB coconut cream for moisturizer, are my favorite right now. If you have an oily skin do give this a shot. It's awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Nanthini

customer_reviews.title: Great Facial Sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: One of the best facial sunscreens. Goes on nicely, non-greasy and feels great on my skin. You have to let it absorb a bit before you put on your makeup or it will feel thick.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Nice sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice sunscreen. It leaves you a silky matte if that’s what you’re looking for. Definitely no greasy residue. I wear this on no makeup days. I prefer a different sunscreen when I wear makeup. It leaves me more hydrated then this one. This would be perfect if you have oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Works great as a primer
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a primer and sunscreen and apply my Foundation over it. It works great, it holds my makeup in place pretty well, and has a sun protection I need.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage
customer_reviews.text: The UV protection is very nice, but there was a slightly noticeable cast from the mineral UV filters. I would continue to use this as a base layer of sunscreen before applying makeup for sure
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The actual best sun block ever!
customer_reviews.text: The actual best sun block ever! Made me an every day sunblock user. I have oily, sensitive, and breakout prone skin. This acts as a primer under my make-up and contains the oil all day! It hasn't caused any breakouts or irritation.
customer_reviews.author: G&KTripleA

customer_reviews.title: I love the matte feeling
customer_reviews.text: It isn't greasy and has a great matte finish. feels good on my face. Recommended by derm for iron oxides that help with age spot protection!!
customer_reviews.author: JMW mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Feels amazing
customer_reviews.text: This cream feels so silky smooth! Not recommended for exercise as it runs really bad. Great for daily wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Best Best Best Sunscreen ever!
customer_reviews.text: MDSolar Sciences is the only brand sunblock I'd use on my face. The consistency is amazing! Nothing like it I've ever encountered. First discovered this brand a few years ago and been using it since and have friends and family use it too. It's just amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Kseniya Khavilova

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time owning a mineral sunscreen and I have to say it’s okay for me. It gives me a white cast, I notice the product strips away the moisturizer on my face after a few hours.. I have to apply moisturizer with the sunscreen. It also feels like primer and sunscreen sits on top of my face.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Love this sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! For years I have struggled with finding a sunscreen that does not irritate my skin or flare up my acne. Finally I can get the protection needed when out hiking. It does not feel overly greasy and rubs in easily, especially compared to zinc based sunscreens that leave you looking white. I highly recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy B

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: It doesnt have a scent. I love it. It leaves a matte finish and it doesnt leave a white finish however, it will if you put a lot. A little will go along way. I am hooked on this product.
customer_reviews.author: herlinda flores

customer_reviews.title: I want to bathe in this sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: I'm obsessed with this sunscreen! I read that Dita Von Teese wears it so naturally I was curious but it can't describe what this sunscreen feels like!!! It's like I'm applying silk to my face! It's like nothing I've ever applied to my face - I've tried every sunscreen on the market and yes believe me this is COMPLETELY different than ANYOTHER sunscreen ever! Seriously! It's worth it! But it now!
customer_reviews.author: kelsey

customer_reviews.title: I do believe it has helped with the redness of ...
customer_reviews.text: I do believe it has helped with the redness of my skin just a little but, also, it is a bit drying. Not overly, but enough that I just can't give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No allergic reaction at all - it is wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only sunscreen that I use when I am outdoors - especially playing golf. No white residue - it blends well and stays on. No allergic reaction at all - it is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Ebshep

customer_reviews.title: The best for antiaging
customer_reviews.text: The best sunscreen on the planet. You rub it in and the white disappears. Makes your skin look great and I mix the tinted with this and It has one of the highest ratings for anti aging UVA rays as well as UVB according to EWG.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Love this mineral sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I love the protection this sunscreen provides as well the texture when applied. It is not greasy and does a great job of soaking in so you don't have that purple hue that many high SPF sunscreens leave.
customer_reviews.author: Katazon

customer_reviews.title: Don't like the added color (iron oxides) in it
customer_reviews.text: If it does not have added color i.e. iron oxides, I would give it a four star. It is also very hard to wash off at end of the day unless you use oil-based cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FILL THE BOTTLE , PLEASE
customer_reviews.text: Love the matte finish and high level of protection, but for this price I would like a full tube of product. The tube I received felt half empty already when I went to use it for the first time....
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: This is the second time I buy it. Happy customer.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great screen protector that looks good on your face, nourishes your skin, and is also environmentally friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Effective barrier
customer_reviews.text: I believe this product had a top rating on BeautyPedia (a cosmetic review site). It seems to provide good even coverage and moisture (best for med to dry skin types). However, it does leave a white cast, so I would apply bronzer over it. Currently using it for beach/vacation/sporting and everyday activities...
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: This product was too strong for me and gave me hives!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Upsetting :(
customer_reviews.text: I got this product after watching a video on how it will melt into darker skin. Which it isn’t too bad, what I’m upset about is that I got about less than half the product. It had a seal on it so they just didn’t put enough sunscreen inside. Which is upsetting since I paid more than I should’ve for getting less than half Of the amount
customer_reviews.author: Simone Falls

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Pros: no scent, evens out skin tone, not too sticky, feels lightweight, does not melt and trickle into eyes irritating them as some chemical sunscreens do Cons: a little drying, slight white tint
customer_reviews.author: Alena

customer_reviews.title: Reactive face approved
customer_reviews.text: No scent! My reactive face LOVES IT! No irritation! Almost seems to claim the redness! Just dont like dimethicone feeling that lingers a while.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Altman

customer_reviews.title: High quality sun block with good price
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t make whitish residuals on face like other brands make and blends well with my BB cream! People tell me I have a natural look without make up thanks to this sunblock.
customer_reviews.author: JUN ZENOBIA SHIM

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sunscreen came highly recommended and it's perfect worth the buy
customer_reviews.author: Enods

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sunblock despite white residue.
customer_reviews.text: The best sunblock I ever used. I get acne pretty easily,so I am always in the acne-fighting mode. Most products, especially sunscreens, cause my skin to breakout. I tried this mineral creme, and it's amazing. It does leave a white residue, but if you apply it really well, over and over, it looks fine, and I have olive skin. I do put it sometimes on my anti-acne CC cream, which has some coverage, and when the two colors mix, the result is great. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product and will definitely purchase more. Is high quality and feels wonderful on skin with a clean scent. My skin looks dewy and balanced.
customer_reviews.author: arizonamegs

customer_reviews.title: Seperation/leaks
customer_reviews.text: This is the only sons going to put on my face because of my sensitive skin . I wear it every day and it blends very well with a variety of moisturizers and face make up. The problem is lately the product is been separating and there is an watery residue that leaks out.
customer_reviews.author: C.C.

customer_reviews.title: Who would want to look like a mummy
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to believe this sunscreen is sold at all. Even when applied thinly and after waiting 15 minutes, my face looked entirely white. Who would want to look like a mummy? Applying makeup over it did not improve the look. The only good thing is that it did not irritate my very sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with the vendor of this product
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product recommended by my dermatologist as a perfect sunscreen. I love it because it is also a great moisturizer under make up.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M. Shivek

customer_reviews.title: Still looking for the perfect sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Have to shake quite a lot before applying. The oil separates from the sunscreen. Also very drying to my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kyong9721

customer_reviews.title: nice consistency, somewhat drying
customer_reviews.text: Nice sunscreen, but I agree with other reviews that it was somewhat drying. I like that it wasn't goopy
customer_reviews.author: Shermurray

customer_reviews.title: Nice product price needs to come down
customer_reviews.text: I had received a sample of this product and I really liked that it is so light. It's not like spreading on thick heavy sunscreen. I do have to say though that the price is too high for me. The container was mostly air it seemed. I doubt I will purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Cabiac

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Smooth Skin & Busy People
customer_reviews.text: My favorite sunscreen. Used Shieldo and MDSolarsciences; I thought MDSolar was better. Because it doesn't dry out my skin or make me break out (I've fallen asleep without washing the sunscreen off, my skin still looked good the next day). Application time is less than 2 minutes for me; I love this sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: but a very good sunscreen that's rated highly by the EWG for not ...
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive for too little product, but a very good sunscreen that's rated highly by the EWG for not being full of toxins and stuff. Maybe this will help us all die just a little more slowly.
customer_reviews.author: smolreader

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Facial Sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I love absolutely love this sunscreen. It blends easily and makes my skin feel silky smooth. No shine either.
customer_reviews.author: young at heart

customer_reviews.title: Feels like silky powder on your face
customer_reviews.text: Feels like silky powder on your face. It does go on a little white, but it goes away. They make a tinted one but it is only 30 spf instead of 50. Wish they would make a tinted 50, I need it with my white burn easy skin.
customer_reviews.author: derro

customer_reviews.title: A+++++
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the best mineral sunscreens I’ve tried. It doesn’t have white cast (on my skin), it makes my face look matte, and it sinks into my skin like a moisturizer instead of on top like most sunscreens
customer_reviews.author: Kalynne Brawner

customer_reviews.title: Love that it protects against UVB rays as much as ...
customer_reviews.text: Love that it protects against UVB rays as much as UVA, and it goes on just like a daily moisturizer, it isn't greasy and it doesn't smell like SPF. I use this on my 2 year old's face as well since it absorbs right away.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Patterson

customer_reviews.title: The best so far
customer_reviews.text: After trying many many sunscreens, finally found this. The best so far, no burning and smooth to apply. I use it mainly for water sports and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Kaushik

product_meta.title: MDSolar Sciences Mineral Crème SPF 50 | Oil-Free, Water-Resistant Lightweight Mineral Broad Spectrum SPF, Absorbs Instantly, Invisible Matte Finish
product_meta.description:
Size:1.7 OunceThis lightweight + silky-smooth crème blends seamlessly & is rich in antioxidants, making it a must-have for any daily beauty or grooming routine. Our exclusive “barely there” formula leaves a matte finish that is perfect to wear both under and over makeup. Naturally derived + safer Eco-cert zinc oxide helps reduce the risk of photo aging and skin cancer. Non-irritating + oil-free, this water-resistant sunscreen is gentle enough for even the most sensitive skin types & suitable for kids 6 months & older. Antioxidants: Vitamin C, Green Tea, Cranberry Fruit & Pomegranate Extracts Non-Comedogenic — Won’t Clog Pores Water-Resistant Up To 80 Minutes Oil & Fragrance Free Rated Best for Sensitive Skin by Good Housekeeping (May 2019)

THIS LIGHTWEIGHT + SILKY-SMOOTH CRÈME BLENDS SEAMLESSLY & IS RICH IN ANTIOXIDANTS, MAKING IT A MUST-HAVE FOR ANY DAILY BEAUTY OR GROOMING ROUTINE. OUR EXCLUSIVE “BARELY THERE” FORMULA LEAVES A MATTE FINISH THAT IS PERFECT TO WEAR BOTH UNDER AND OVER MAKEUP. NATURALLY DERIVED + SAFER ECO-CERT ZINC OXIDE HELPS REDUCE THE RISK OF PHOTO AGING AND SKIN CANCER. NON-IRRITATING + OIL-FREE, THIS WATER-RESISTANT SUNSCREEN IS GENTLE ENOUGH FOR EVEN THE MOST SENSITIVE SKIN TYPES & SUITABLE FOR KIDS 6 MONTHS & OLDER. ANTIOXIDANTS: VITAMIN C, GREEN TEA, CRANBERRY FRUIT & POMEGRANATE EXTRACTS NON-COMEDOGENIC — WON’T CLOG PORES WATER-RESISTANT UP TO 80 MINUTES OIL & FRAGRANCE FREE RATED BEST FOR SENSITIVE SKIN BY GOOD HOUSEKEEPING (MAY 2019)
MDSolarSciences™ is a collection of DoctorDeveloped Skincare + Sun Care formulas that people love to wear. Our formulations protect, repair and promote healthy skin using EcoCert® Zinc Oxide and powerful antioxidants.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
